thread.title: RPvanderfield

author: RPvanderfield
title: RPvanderfield
text:
I did not wanted a Bitcoin app on my mobilephone, also not an software wallet on my laptop because this will be regularly used by frends at my home.
So I whas thinking how can I safely manage my bitcoins, litecoin or Ethereum.
After some research, I came to the most secure hardware wallet "KeepKey".
So i ordered online, receive, unpacked, connected and within 3 minutes i charge money into the hardware wallet.
KeepKey the safest and easy to use Bitcoin wallet.
Regarding
Rico
